page.name: Parrrrrotical Pete the Parrot
page.description: Squawk!  This is the perfect pet for land-lubbers or sea-dogs alike!  Watch as a flurry of foliage is flung at your opponents as Parrrrrotical Pete the Parrot pet defends you!
